value.stringValue: The LeadInvoked_Status_is_changed-4 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke LeadInvoked_Status_is_changed-4, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The LeadInvoked_Status_is_changed-4 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke LeadInvoked_Status_is_changed-4, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

Flow.description: Process is triggered when a status of a lead is changed.
Flow.label: LeadInvoked: Status is changed
